related_questions.question: Contoh paragraf dalam kalimat-kalimat yang bentuk present perfect tense​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Today is 16th August and tomorrow is my sister’s birthday. Her name is Kristal. I want to give her a surprise. I have talked to some of her friends. They have helped me to prepare a surprising party. We have discussed it since July.

We are going to celebrate my sister’s birthday in a small restaurant near my house. Our parents have also agreed it. The restaurant has been booked by our parents.

What about the birthday present? No worries, I have prepared it too. She loves art very much. I have made a painting for her. I hope she will like it. But I haven’t wrapped the painting because it hasn’t dried yet.

Have you ever celebrated someone’s birthday?

Jawaban:

related_questions.question:
This text is for questions 7-8    ANNOUNCEMENT
For all Junior High School teachers
POSTER COMPETITION
Friday, May 21, 2021
1328 Scott Hall, 11 a.m. - 1 p.m.
Your poster must be:
Original
Colorful
Theme:
Let's protect ourselves from COVID-19
Stay Healthy By wearing Masks
Judges:
Mr. Thoms Waldschmidt
Ms. Sylvia Hanson
7.What is the onnouncement about?
A.poster competition
B.Teacher competition
C.How to wear mask
COVID-19 pandemic​
Taj mahal of india is...than candi prambanan of indonesia

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Taj mahal of india is bigger than candi prambanan of indonesia

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk komparatif dengan kata sifat (Adjective) satu suku kata sehingga untuk membentuk komparatif harus ditambahkan akhiran -er, menjadi is bigger than. Jawaban tidak mutlak is bigger than, tetapi bisa juga is smaller than atau kata lain yang dianggap lebih sesuai dan lebih valid berdasarkan data pengukuran matematis.

Semoga membantu ya.

Jawaban:

You....... an old table​

You have an old table.

Penjelasan:

Jawaban pada kalimat di atas dicetak tebal dan merupakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan fakta. Jika subjek nya adalah kata You, maka harus memakai kata kerja Have yang artinya memiliki.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
25. Pram: "What are we going to do after work?"    Yuni : "We can have dinner at the plaza at 7 if you
like."
Pram: "Sounds good. I'll pick you up at 6.30. We
need half an hour to get there.
Where will they probably be at six forty-five?
A. At the Plaza.
B. In the office.
C. Still at work.
D. On the way to the Plaza
E. They will meet at Plaza​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D

Penjelasan:

Arti

Pram : "Apa yang akan kita lakukan setelah selesai bekerja?"

Yuni :"Kita bisa makan malam di plaza jam 7 jika kamu mau"

Pram :"Baiklah. Aku akan menjemputmu pada jam 6.30. kita butuh setengah jam untuk sampai kesana."

karena untuk sampai ke Plaza kira kira pada jam 7. Maka pada saat jam 6.45, mereka masih otw ke plaza.

Jadi jawabannya adalah D
